    • containsEntry

      public LogEntryStatus containsEntry(int index, int term) throws IOException
      Checks if an entry exists and where it is (log or snapshot.json)
      Parameters:
      index - index of the entry to check in the Log
      term - term of the entry to check in the Log
      Returns:
      an ENUM, depending on the position of the Log Entry (if it exists)
      Throws:
      IOException

    • appendEntry

      public void appendEntry(LogEntry entry, int commitIndex) throws IOException
      Appends a LogEntry to the Log
      Parameters:
      entry - LogEntry to append
      commitIndex - parameter needed to avoid snapshotting uncommitted entries
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getEntries

      public List<LogEntry> getEntries() throws IOException
      Used to get the entries written in the log file and NOT snapshotted (useful to print to terminal)
      Returns:
      a List of LogEntries
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getEntry

      public LogEntry getEntry(int index) throws IOException, SnapshottedEntryException
      Retrieve LogEntry form log file (given that it has not been snapshotted), given the index
      Parameters:
      index - requested index
      Returns:
      LogEntry, having requested index
      Throws:
      IOException
      SnapshottedEntryException

    • getEntries

      public List<LogEntry> getEntries(int fromIndexInclusive, int toIndexExclusive) throws IOException, SnapshottedEntryException
      Get the entries written in the log file (specified range)
      Parameters:
      fromIndexInclusive - lower bound (included) index
      toIndexExclusive - upper bound (NOT included) index
      Returns:
      a list of LogEntries, having index in the requested range
      Throws:
      IOException
      SnapshottedEntryException
